Location.Description: You stand alone in your room. Today launches the highly anticipated game SBURB BETA. Difficulty: Trivial
Fight minions and climb the echeladder. Difficulty: Easy
Location.UnlockDescription: Unlock by reaching Level 10 with your starting character.

Location.Description: At the heart of each planet lies a Denizen. But there are no Choices here. Difficulty: High
Location.UnlockDescription: Unlock by defeating any enemy in the Dreambubble.

Location.Description: Years in the past, but not many.... Difficulty: High to Very High
Location.UnlockDescription: Unlock by defeating any enemy in the Dreambubble.

Location.Description: Stop by for a friendly game of table stickball. Difficulty: Final Boss
Location.UnlockDescription: Unlock by defeating Her Imperious Condescension in Alternia.

Location.Description: A crossroads for the dead and the not yet dead. Difficulty: Medium
Location.UnlockDescription: Unlock after beating SBURB for the first time.
